sections.paragraph: வினைச்சொல் - பைத்தியமாய் நட, வாடு, உலர்ந்துபோ, உதிர், தொய்ந்துபோ, முனை விழுந்துபோ, கரைந்துபோ, உதிர்ந்து விழு, அசட்டை பண்ணு, பலவீனப்படுத்து
1) to be senseless, to be foolish
1) to regard or treat as foolish
2) to sink or drop down, to languish, to wither and fall, to fade (Qal)
1) to sink or to drop down
2) to fall, to wither and fall, to fade

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: A primitive root; to wilt; generally to fall away, fail, faint; figuratively to be foolish or (morally) wicked; causatively to despise, disgrace: - disgrace, dishonour, lightly esteem, fade (away, -ing), fall (down, -ling, off), do foolishly, come to nought, X surely, make vile, wither.
Cognate: H5034, H5036, H5037, H5038, H5039, H5040, H5041
